clocks.name: Dracon’Thor’reth — Hunger
ticks_on: Extended fasting, deprivation, or denial of magical intake
Using fel/arcane as a crutch instead of discipline
Severe emotional provocation while depleted
clears_or_reduces_on: Choosing restraint when a brutal victory is available
Healthy, deliberate mana management instead of binge/withdrawal
clocks.fills_trigger: The seal flares uncontrollably; you take a major compelled action as the dragon-hunger drives behavior.

clocks.name: Discipline of Taran’Zhu
ticks_on: Restraint under provocation
Non-lethal takedowns when lethal would be easier
Using chi/breath to master the seal rather than feed it
clocks.fills_trigger: You gain a lasting benefit (new stunt, aspect, or a once-per-scene free invoke) representing true mastery of inner stillness.

clocks.name: Dracon’o Belore — Relic Reclaimed
ticks_on: Recovering Dragonseal relic fragments
Defending the relic from theft/corruption
Unlocking a new inscription or technique tied to the relic
clocks.fills_trigger: The relic awakens fully; it becomes a defining Extra with a new unlocked capability and narrative obligations.

clocks.name: House Dragonseal — Restoration
ticks_on: Public or military victories that redeem the family name
Protecting innocents/Quel’thalas at cost to self
Recovering lost Dragonseal records, heirs, or holdings
clears_or_reduces_on: Political compromise that stains the house’s rebuilt trust
clocks.fills_trigger: Dragonseal becomes a respected minor house again, with real political leverage and obligations.

clocks.name: Rommath — Pragmatic Alliance
ticks_on: Delivering results that advance Rommath’s political/military goals
Showing discretion with dangerous knowledge
Solving a threat without creating public scandal
clocks.fills_trigger: Rommath offers direct patronage: a boon, a new resource channel, or a high-stakes mission with insider support.

clocks.name: Captain Aethrya Moonshadow — Bitter Respect
ticks_on: Beating her cleanly in the field
Demonstrating mastery over her ward/lattice doctrine
Sparing her people when you could have butchered them
clocks.fills_trigger: Aethrya changes her approach to you (rival-acknowledgment): she offers terms, knowledge, or a personal bargain rather than blind hatred.

clocks.name: Ashenvale — Retrieval Raid Mobilizes
ticks_on: Capturing Kaldorei assets (officers, elders, relics)
Leaving obvious red-chi/ward residue trails
Repeated defeats humiliating the canopy screen
clocks.fills_trigger: A dedicated retrieval strike launches: elite Wardens, bind-mages, and shadowstalkers attempt a coordinated rescue/kill op.

clocks.name: Whispers of the Canopy
ticks_on: Repeated signature techniques witnessed
Survivors spreading consistent descriptions
Leaving identifiable evidence (weapon marks, residue, trophies)
clocks.fills_trigger: Kaldorei intel solidifies; they deploy a prepared counterplay keyed to your patterns.

clocks.name: Aethrya — Blood Debt Oath
ticks_on: Humiliation in front of her people
Capture / restraint / forced retreat
Wounding her while denying her a clean death
clocks.fills_trigger: Aethrya commits to a personal vendetta protocol (or, alternatively, a desperate bargain) that reshapes the arc.

clocks.name: Notoriety — The Crimson Siphoner
ticks_on: Public battlefield displays
Large-scale casualties attributed to you
Elite enemies wounded/captured with clear signature technique
clocks.fills_trigger: A formal bounty + elite hunt response is activated.

clocks.name: Ashenvale — Nature’s Reprisal
ticks_on: Blood spilled deep in sacred ground
Ward-geometry torn apart and left to fester
Druidic assets harmed or taken
clocks.fills_trigger: The forest actively hunts back: terrain hazards, awakened ancients, and nature-driven complications escalate.
